biotools.summary: CancerCellNet is a R package that allows cancer type classification and evaluation of transcriptional fidelity for cancer models across species and platform (bulk RNA-seq, microarray). Alternatively, you can visit our web-app. You can also read about the applications of CancerCellNet in our bioRxiv preprint.
